markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=4666) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Soul Warden](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=173) (Level 16), [Vindicator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=285) (Level 8), [Campfire Chronicler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=300) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Domain Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=4644)

</column>

---

Your prayers have unlocked deeper secrets of your deity’s domain. You gain an advanced domain spell from one of your [domains](Domains.aspx) for which you have an initial domain spell.

**Special** You can select this feat multiple times. Each time, you must select a different advanced domain spell.

<title level="2">Advanced Domain leads to...</title>
[Deity's Protection](/Feats.aspx?ID=4687)
name: Advanced Domain
